{{< entity_summary >}}
The Government of Canada spent an estimated **\$11.6M in 2021-2022** on contracts with KING HOE EXCAVATING.

Across 3 contracts active since the start of the 2017-2018 fiscal year, 2 have at least one amendment (67%). Of contracts with amendments, the average increase in dollar value was 20% and the average number of amendments was 1.5. Cumulatively these amendments represent an increase of \$4.1M over the original contract values.

The average contract duration was 0.24 years, and the average contract value (not including contracts under \$10k) was \$9.3M. The longest contract was 0.57 years. The largest contract by value (including amendments) was \$14.9M.

{{< /entity_summary >}}
